means: 不受拘束地进行想象，未知恋爱滋味的，天真无邪的

sentence.Network_en: In the eyes of the public, a divorced man is footloose and fancy-free.
sentence.Network_cn: 在公众心目中，离婚的男人无牵无挂、自由自在。

sentence.Network_en: You will be footloose and fancy free soon enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 你很快就会自由自在,无拘无束了.

sentence.Network_en: Bit of a lad is Mr Bryan , running round fancy - free for years.
sentence.Network_cn: 布赖恩先生真是个放荡不羁的人,多年来优哉游哉, 逍遥自在.
